meta.title: Hexo
meta.description: Do not take anyone else's word about what is right and wrong.
meta.author: NineEr

pages.title: about
pages.text: document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

posts.title: nginx openresty content_by_lua_file 404
posts.text: 配置好lua脚本如下错误: 12 nginx openresty content_by_lua_file 404错误:2020/02/10 19:18:59 [error] 21231#0: *63 failed to load external Lua file "/home/l/lua/content_lua.lua": cannot open /home/l/lua/content_lua.lua: Permission denied, client: [ip], server: localhost, request: "POST /lua_server HTTP/1.1", host: "[ip]+[port]" nginx配置文件里添加 1user root root; 即可

posts.title: blog introduce
posts.text: 关于博客 Welcome to my blog ! I would appreciate your guidance . 记录程序媛技术与生活 分享遇到的bug解决方案 以及分享生活有所感触的一切 等我成长时会有技术分享 欢迎同行技术交流 不对的地方还请多多赐教 博客搭建参考:https://blog.csdn.net/weixin_39879178/article/details/80319392 博客主题来自:https://github.com/Tomotoes/hexo-theme-tomotoes document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });
